name: Through the Kill Screen- Demo
description:
An adventure-horror-RPG, mixing Stranger Things, Earthbound and 1980s video game insanity.

Set in the small town of Snoring, Leon and his best friend Gary are, once again, sent to the Headteacher's office. Little do they know, this will start a quest spilling over with sugar-rushes, imagination and arcade classics.

A cursed computer game threatens 'reality.' Something lurks behind the monitor. Even now, it reaches through the kill screen...

Play the Introduction Demo below.
